name: Canyon Mouth
description: Where a narrow canyon opens into desert. Red rock walls rise on either side. Echo chamber effect. Cool air flows out from the canyon's depth.
lighting_quality: Dramatic. Walls catch and hold color—red, orange, purple depending on time. Shadows are dense.
temperature_range: Cool—canyon creates shade and channels cold air from depth.
acoustic_quality: Amplifying echo. Every sound repeats. Whispers become shouts.
architectural_features: Narrow passage leading deeper into canyon
atmosphere: Ancient and resonant. A space that remembers.
